headline: Lateral Flow Assay Components Market to Hit USD 486.2 Million by 2030: Rising Prevalence of Infectious Diseases Drives Growth
summary: The global lateral flow assay (LFA) components market is poised for significant growth, projected to reach USD 486.2 million by 2030 from USD 392.4 million in 2025, with a CAGR of 4.4%. This expansion is driven by rising infectious diseases, demand for point-of-care testing, and home-based diagnostics. Sandwich assays dominate due to their high sensitivity and specificity in clinical settings. Medical device manufacturers lead market demand, while contract manufacturers grow, especially in Asia-
